name: We trust you
description:
Humanity is on the brink of extinction. Planet Earth no longer has the ability to sustain life on its dying carcass.
Global warming, resource abuse, floods, overpopulation and chemical wars have left no other option  but to make one last trip that gives a glimmer of hope  to continue the history of humanity for light years to come.
An AI (You) has been assigned to keep the remaining humans safe in their slumber, while they go through the void.
Their last words to the AI before entering cryogenic sleep:
"We trust you."
